teaching.headline: I teach at the Digital Career Institute.
teaching.paragraph:
Since December 2018 I have taught over 100 participants about webdevelopment. I worked together with other teachers on the curriculum and taught the students how to program. 
 From HTML, CSS and JavaScript to React.js, Node.js and MongoDB I trained the students to become Fullstack JavaScript Developers.

hire.headline: How I can help you
hire.step1: I plan, conceive, design and realize your digital project.
hire.step2: I support your team with my competences in your project.
hire.step3: I'm giving her team a workshop to take you to the next level.
hire.step4: Ich spreche bei ihrem Event über aktuelle Themem im Bereich Design und Development.

section1.headline: About me
section1.paragraph: Hi, my name is Simon. I believe that the combination of good digital design and modern technology can improve products and how we deal with them. I am suspicious of what is and determined to change the way our digital products look and work.

section2.headline: Digital products by craftsmanship
section2.paragraph1: I develop every project, no matter if website or web app, individually by hand according to your needs. I use the latest technologies, which are also used by Google, Facebook, Airbnb or Trivago. I like to work with people who want to make a difference. And who have understood how digital projects work.
section2.paragraph2: I love what I do and I am constantly refining my ability to translate brand stories into a visually unique and engaging user experience.

section3.headline: Lecturer at the Digital Career Institute
section3.paragraph: Since December 2017 I have been teaching at the Digital Career Institute and since then I have taught more than 100 participants in Düsseldorf, Hamburg and Berlin about Modern Web Development and Digital Design.
